use_case: Conceptual Digital Illustration and Portfolio Art
template: A single cohesive image of [SUBJECT]. The artwork is a composite layer effect: the top layer is a rough [SKETCH STYLE] on [PAPER TEXTURE] which is ripped and torn in specific spots to reveal a hyper-realistic [COLOR STYLE] underneath. Critical: The sketch lines and the colored parts are perfectly aligned and anatomically consistent; they form one single continuous subject. The torn paper edges create a window into the colored reality beneath the sketch. White background, high contrast, 8k resolution, seamless transition.

variable_explanations.[SUBJECT]: Controls the main focus or object of the artwork (e.g., 'a charging rhino', 'a futuristic skyscraper').
variable_explanations.[SKETCH STYLE]: Defines the specific technique and roughness of the top layer (e.g., 'charcoal pencil', 'blue ballpoint pen', 'technical blueprint drawing').
variable_explanations.[PAPER TEXTURE]: Specifies the surface material of the ripped layer, influencing the visual feel of the tear (e.g., 'parchment', 'watercolor paper', 'aged newsprint').
variable_explanations.[COLOR STYLE]: Determines the aesthetic and realism of the revealed layer underneath the sketch (e.g., 'cinematic lighting photorealism', 'iridescent oil painting', 'neon vaporwave render').

tips: Use highly specific and contrasting styles for [SKETCH STYLE] and [COLOR STYLE] to maximize the visual impact of the reveal (e.g., 'rough graphite' vs. 'smooth digital matte painting').
Ensure the [SUBJECT] is complex enough to benefit from the hyper-detailed rendering in the colored layer.
If using Midjourney, experimenting with high `--stylize` values can sometimes help the AI maintain the structural consistency required for the 'perfectly aligned' constraint.
description: A high-impact prompt designed to create dramatic layered artwork where a rough sketch layer is physically torn away to expose a meticulously detailed, hyper-realistic colored rendering underneath. The prompt emphasizes perfect anatomical alignment and a seamless conceptual transition between the two realities.

feedback.TITLE QUALITY: The title, 'Epic Cinematic Portrait Generation Guide,' is highly descriptive and includes the required emotional descriptors ('Epic Cinematic'). It meets the word count (5 words) and clearly conveys the output type (Portrait). However, 'Generation Guide' is unnecessary filler. A stricter title like 'Epic Cinematic Portrait' would be punchier and more professional for a marketplace listing, resulting in a minor deduction.
feedback.TEMPLATE STRUCTURE: The template is exemplary. The subject variable `[SUBJECT]` is clearly marked. The prompt is rich with high-value core style descriptors (volumetric lighting, deep focus, cinematic color grading) which make up well over 40% of the instruction. Technical specifications are complete, including 8k resolution, camera emulation (Arri Alexa), aspect ratio (`--ar 16:9`), and style modifier (`--style raw`). It perfectly aligns with the 'Cinematic Portrait' promise.
feedback.VARIABLE EXAMPLES: The package provides 7 examples, which is below the required 8-10 minimum. While the diversity is excellent, covering abstract concepts ('joy' personified), specific characters (Viking warrior), and categorized subjects (golden retriever), the quantity must be met to demonstrate full range and robustness. A deduction is applied for the missing examples.
feedback.COMMERCIAL VIABILITY: The commercial strategy is strong. Clear use cases (Concept art, profile pictures) target high-value user needs. The suggested price ($3.99 - mid-to-high tier) is appropriate given the technical complexity and high-quality output promise. The UVP—delivery of 'Hollywood-level visuals' through specific technical controls—is clearly established.
feedback.DESCRIPTION QUALITY: The description is concise and effective. It starts with a compelling, pain-point-driven hook ('Tired of flat images?'). It clearly lists the key technical features (Arri Alexa emulation, volumetric light control) and specifies relevant use cases (character design, portfolio building). This segment is marketplace-ready.

priority_improvements: Increase the number of VARIABLE EXAMPLES from 7 to a minimum of 8 (preferably 10) to fully demonstrate the template's versatility across different categories.
Refine the TITLE to remove extraneous words like 'Generation Guide.' Suggested revision: 'Epic Cinematic Portrait' or 'Volumetric Cinematic Portrait.'

commercial_description:
Unlock hyper-realistic, emotionally charged imagery that looks straight out of a $10,000 studio shoot, instantly.

*   **Cinematic Depth, Zero Effort:** Our proprietary layering technique automatically applies film-grade color grading and depth of field, giving your subject breathtaking presence without needing complex post-processing commands.
*   **The "Reality Reveal" Effect:** Achieve a signature composite look where textures and details are subtly enhanced and woven into the background, creating images so tangible you feel you could reach out and touch them.
*   **Universal Subject Adaptation:** Designed to flawlessly interpret any input—from architecture to portraits to abstract concepts—maintaining the premium, consistent aesthetic every single time.

Perfect for designers, marketers, social media creators, and artists who demand museum-quality realism for their portfolios, campaigns, or personal projects.

Stop struggling with endless parameter tweaks; this template is your one-click shortcut to images that simply look expensive.
